lines.text: We don't learn. We just get older, and we know.
[describing how his puppets' personalities are reflections of his own]
the thief, the opportunist, full of compromise and lies like any other man. I have in me all these things.

What the devil is the matter with you? You're in love with the girl and she's in love with someone else. This sort of thing happens all the time; people don't *die* of love. You'll recover... But meanwhile can't you be civilized about it?

[whispering unseen from behind the puppet stage in his own voice]
And I care, Lili.
